Consistently rated as excellent by 185-70r13 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 185/70R13 Tire Size
185/70R13 tires are mostly used on passenger cars from the 80s and 90s like the BMW 320i, Dodge Colt, Honda Accord, Mazda RX-7, Nissan Stanza, Subaru GL, Toyota Corolla, Triumph TR8, and Volkswagen Quantum. 185/70R13 tires are offered in all-season, summer, touring, performance, highway, and various other categories to meet the needs of different drivers.

Popular vehicles: 
1980-1983 BMW 320i
1984-1995 Dodge Colt
1982-1989 Honda Accord
1980-1985 Mazda RX-7
1982-1986 Nissan Stanza
1981-1989 Subaru GL
1980-1992 Toyota Corolla
1980-1981 Triumph TR8
1982-1987 Volkswagen Quantum

All-season tires provide year-round traction and are good for purchase for those who only want to use one set of tires. Consider the Kumho Solus TA11[Kumho Solus TA11](https://simpletire.com/brands/kumho-tires/solus-ta11), Laufenn G FIT AS LH14, and Kenda Kenetica KR17 if you need a set of 185/70R13 tires that performs in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions.

As the name suggests, summer tires are made for good performance in summer conditions and regions with warmer climates, and these need to be swapped with winter or all-season tires if you live in the land of four seasons. Have a look at the [Achilles 122](https://simpletire.com/brands/achilles-tires/122) and Radar Dimax Classic if you need a set of 185/70R13 tires for commendable drives during the summers.

Whether you drive an 80s or 90s era Honda Accord, Nissan Stanza, Toyota Corolla, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 185/70R13 tires that meet your needs at a greater price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
